name: Chess 2 by Oats Jenkins (Alpha)
description:
I watched Oats Jenkins Video where he made a better chess, and I took this as an opportunity to refresh my game making knowledge, so I took the challenge of making this a game.

I know that Oats Jenkins is planing on making this an online game too.  I promise, that if he is making money with his online Version, I am taking down mine, because he clearly owns the rights to the idea.

To play, first watch Oats Jenkins Video to know the rules. You can just click on the figures to move them. Above and below you have space to place knocked out figures. 

This is just the first Alpha build, this game is still in development, I am documenting the process of making this game in German:   https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmZ-E_i5NCwdNp-VWn1Fizgug6LkUjG2P

What I am planing to add to this game:

  • being able to play this game like every other chess game
  • setting menu
  • online multiplayer
  • dark mode
  • simple computer opponent

What I need your opinion about:

  • Should I make the figures white or leave it transparent?
  • Should you only be able to get 2 fishi queens or more?
  • Should I add the professional game progress display, I personally don't see why you would want this?

Always let me know in the comments what I should add, what I can improve, and if I misunderstood any rules.

I know the bear should start in the middle, but it wasn't worth adding this in this alpha.
